name: Yamnuska Rock 2nd Edition
description: A climbing guide to over 200 routes on the big flat face of Mt Yamnuska. This south-facing slab faces the sun and attracts climbers every month of the year. Climbs range in grade from 5.4 through 5.14, and encompass the very bold to the more conservative. Routes are described in detail and accompanied by maps and colour photographs.
